about.title: About us
about.subtitle: Passionate web developers focused on businesses and individuals
about.story: We started Weblio with a simple idea: to make professional websites accessible to all businesses and individuals. As experienced developers, we saw that many businesses needed help being visible online, but most solutions were either too expensive or too complicated.
about.mission: Our mission is to help businesses grow by giving them the tools they need to succeed online. We believe in transparency, simplicity and personal service.

member1.name: Francisco Mouat
member1.description: 4+ years of experience in system development and customer delivery.

member2.name: Albin Médoc
member2.description: 8+ years of experience in system development, specialized in user-friendly design and functionality.

info.title: Contact information
info.consultationText: We always offer a free consultation where we go through your needs and give you advice regardless of whether you choose to work with us or not.

testimonial1.text: Weblio helped us get a professional website that truly represents our restaurant. Bookings have increased by 40% since launch!
testimonial1.author: Maria Lindström

testimonial2.text: Fantastic service and a team that really understands what small businesses need. Our new website has given us so much more credibility.
testimonial2.author: Johan Eriksson

testimonial3.text: They handled everything from A to Z. I didn't have to think about technology at all, but could focus on my business.
testimonial3.author: Lisa Andersson
